title: Underweight Europe on Italian election concerns, says Oliver Pursche
text:
Underweight Europe on Italian election concerns, says Oliver Pursche 3:04pm EDT - 05:21
Bruderman Brothers' chief market strategist explains in a chat with Reuters' Fred Katayama why he cut his recommended exposure to European equities and why he has become more defensive in U.S. equities.
Bruderman Brothers' chief market strategist explains in a chat with Reuters' Fred Katayama why he cut his recommended exposure to European equities and why he has become more defensive in U.S. equities. //reut.rs/2ISDZlW
